name: Skelly
tagline: barebones linux distro with plan9 like features
body:
### skelly.
is a barebones linux distro, with some plan9-esque functionality, based on glendix. It's not got a lot of cruft, just the essentials.

### Authors and Contributors
Too many people to mention authored the individual components, I just put them together. I am @infoburp on github and twitter.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with skelly? Check out the documentation on these pages or contact gwolfendale@gmail.com and I'll help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
